projects.title: Check out my latest work
projects.description: I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are a few of my favorites.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Want to chat? Just shoot me a dm with a direct question on twitter and I'll respond whenever I can. I will ignore all soliciting.

profile.description: A skilled mobile developer with 5 years of experience, focusing on application development, UI/UX design, and innovation. Proficient in mobile technologies, I've successfully delivered user-centric solutions. Skilled in project management and dedicated to crafting high-quality apps that meet client needs.
profile.summary: A skilled mobile developer with 5 years of experience, focusing on application development, UI/UX design, and innovation. Proficient in mobile technologies, I've successfully delivered user-centric solutions. Skilled in project management and dedicated to crafting high-quality apps that meet client needs.

wiicode.title: Flutter Developer
wiicode.description: Developed TheCyrcle car rental app and Fatou home automation app using Flutter with TDD approach and RESTful API integration.
tasks: Developed TheCyrcle, a cross-platform car rental app using Flutter and TDD
Translated high-fidelity Figma designs into functional mobile applications
Built Fatou, a complex home automation app with over 50 screens
Collaborated with backend teams to align mobile features with API structures
Maintained clean, scalable, and well-documented code for long-term maintainability

bkgspeed.title: Lead Software Engineer
bkgspeed.description: Led mobile app redesign with real-time tracking and team management for successful launch in Senegal.
tasks: Spearheaded redesign and development of stable and scalable mobile applications
Implemented real-time driver tracking using Google Maps SDK
Integrated data flows from Firebase Firestore, Realtime Database, and custom APIs
Developed secure ride requests, driver profiles, and payment processing features
Led technical team for successful BKG Speed launch in Senegal
Conducted stress testing and performance analysis for app reliability

aekgroup.title: Software Engineer
aekgroup.description: Developed Pay'ici mobile app for USSD code management with dual SIM support and custom Flutter plugins.
tasks: Developed Pay'ici cross-platform app for Togolese mobile operator USSD codes
Designed fully offline experience with periodic updates from Firebase Firestore
Engineered dual SIM support with custom Flutter plugin and native Kotlin code
Consolidated hundreds of USSD codes into user-friendly interface
Ensured high performance and platform consistency using Flutter

leotech.title: Software Developer
leotech.description: Maintained client applications and developed UNIMOON website using ReactJS and TailwindCSS.
tasks: Maintained and updated various client applications for stability and performance
Developed UNIMOON website using ReactJS and TailwindCSS
Led implementation of GesPro management software with staff training
Managed updates and improvements for SGI-TOGO website and mobile application

plusservice.title: Software Developer
plusservice.description: Built PAVS Account Manager desktop app and Catalogue PAVS Android app with real-time data synchronization.
tasks: Built PAVS Account Manager desktop app using Flutter and Socket.io
Developed user authentication, password reset, and light/dark mode theming
Created real-time customer account management with local API integration
Designed Catalogue PAVS Android app with Firebase Firestore integration
Implemented Google authentication and real-time product updates

wes.degree: Bachelor's Degree Equivalence by World Education Service

trendz.description: Event management platform with 3 mobile apps (iOS/Android) built in Flutter. Features include Firebase authentication, mobile payments, real-time data sync, and automated CI/CD deployment.

molory.description: Mobile application suite with 3 Flutter apps for iOS and Android. Implements Firebase integration, local caching with Hive, payment processing, and user feedback systems.

thecyrele.description: Ride-sharing mobile application built with Flutter using Test Driven Development. Features real-time tracking, secure payments, and comprehensive testing framework.

klic.description: On-demand service app similar to Uber and Uber Eats. Built with Flutter featuring real-time GPS tracking, payment integration, rating system, and admin dashboards.

pavs.description: Desktop application for account management built with Flutter. Features user authentication, real-time data sync with Socket.io, and dual theme support.

cataloguePavsApp.description: Android product catalog app with Firebase integration. Manages product inventory, prices, and orders with Google authentication.
